document_data.name: Shert
document_data.mainbody: '''Shert''' was one of the [[horse]]s that belonged to the noble [[Pharaboldi]] family of [[Arrabar]] ''circa'' [[1373 DR]].
document_data.Description: Shert was a bigger-sized steed with a bay coat, a reddish-brown color.
document_data.History: Shert, along with other Pharaboldi horses were cared for by [[Turcan]], the family's stablemaster. In the {{YearlinkName|1373}}, Shert was the favorite mount of Pharaboldi's young boarish scion [[Denrick Pharaboldi]]. He rode the horse on [[Tarsakh 10]], during the visit from the unwilling object of his affections - [[Emriana Matrell]]. The couple planned on taking a horseback ride that culminated in a picnic.
